text: Robert W. Peterson (October 19, 1937 â€“ November 5, 2020) was a Canadian Liberal politician. He was a senator from Saskatchewan. He was appointed to the Senate by Prime Minister Paul Martin on March 24, 2005. He left office on October 19, 2012. Peterson died on November 5, 2020 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *CBC News article about new senators Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Saskatchewan
